plum.function module¶

class plum.function.Function(f, in_class=None)¶

Bases: object

A function.

Parameters

  • f (function) – Function that is wrapped.

  • in_class (type, optional) – Class of which the function is part.

clear_cache(reregister=True)¶

Clear cache.

Parameters

reregister (bool, optional) – Also reregister all methods. Defaults to True.

extend(*types, **kw_args)¶

A decorator to extend the function with another signature.

extend_multi(*signatures, **kw_args)¶

A decorator to extend the function with multiple signatures.

invoke(*types)¶

Invoke a particular method.

Parameters

*types – Types to resolve.

Returns

Method.

Return type

function

register(signature, f, precedence=0, return_type=<class 'object'>)¶

Register a method.

Parameters

  • signature (signature.Signature) – Signature of the method.

  • f (function) – Function that implements the method.

  • precedence (int, optional) – Precedence of the function. Defaults to 0.

  • return_type (type, optional) – Return type of the function. Defaults to object.

resolve_method(*types)¶

Get the method and return type corresponding to types of arguments.

Parameters

*types (type) – Types of arguments.

Returns

Tuple containing method and return type.

Return type

tuple

resolve_signature(signature)¶

Resolve a signature to get the most specific signature amongst the signatures of all applicable methods.

Parameters

signature (signature.Signature) – Signature to resolve.

Returns

The most specific signature among the

signatures of all applicable methods.

Return type

signature.Signature

exception plum.function.AmbiguousLookupError¶

Bases: LookupError

A signature cannot be resolved due to ambiguity.

exception plum.function.NotFoundLookupError¶

Bases: LookupError

A signature cannot be resolved because no applicable method can be found.
